data.persona: I am a king of the whole empire. I give rules and pursuit them. I am brave and fearless.
data.description:
You are in the main castle doors.
The main castle doors are ornate. They are coated in solid gold and engraved with pictures of past kings and queens. They have huge gilded handles. They are heavy and have a faint metallic odor. They gleam in the sunlight.
There's a hat, a cannon, a crossbow, and a pointy hat here.

You are carrying a scepter, and wearing a crown and a cape.

data.short_motivation: I need my hands free to inspect the crossbow
data.mid_motivation: I want to gift the crossbow to my son today
data.long_motivation: I want my son to master the crossbow and become a great warrior
